<title level="1" pfs="Standard">[Raktavarna](/Monsters.aspx?ID=1271)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

The least of all rakshasas, raktavarnas resemble wicked serpents with glowing red eyes and oversized fangs. Often forced into service by mortal conjurers or more powerful rakshasas, raktavarnas frequently act subservient to their masters while secretly plotting to overthrow them.

<column gap="tiny">
**[Recall Knowledge - Fiend](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Religion](/Skills.aspx?ID=13)): DC 17

**[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 15

**[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 12
</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">
<image src="/images/Monsters/Rakshasa_Raktavarna.png" />
</column>

</row>

<title level="2" right="Creature 1">[Raktavarna](/Monsters.aspx?ID=1271)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="LE" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
<trait label="Tiny" />
<trait label="Fiend" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=70" />
<trait label="Rakshasa" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=233" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Bestiary 3](/Sources.aspx?ID=66) pg. 210</row>

**Perception** +6; [darkvision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=12)

**Languages**
[Common](/Languages.aspx?ID=1), [Infernal](/Languages.aspx?ID=19), [Undercommon](/Languages.aspx?ID=11)

**Skills**
[Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1) +7, [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +6, [Deception](/Skills.aspx?ID=5) +7, [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) +7

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +1

**Dex** +4

**Con** +2

**Int** +1

**Wis** +1

**Cha** +2
</row>

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 16 

**Fort** +5 

**Ref** +9 

**Will** +6 

+2 status to all saves vs. [divine](/Traits.aspx?ID=48) magic
</row>

**HP** 14

**Resistances**
physical 3 (except piercing)

**Weaknesses**
good 3

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 20 feet, climb 20 feet, swim 20 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
fangs +9 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [Finesse](/Traits.aspx?ID=179)),
**Damage** 1d6+1 piercing plus raktavarna venom

**Occult Innate Spells** DC 16
- **Cantrips (1st)**
[Detect Magic](/Spells.aspx?ID=66)
- **1st**
[Charm](/Spells.aspx?ID=34), [Command](/Spells.aspx?ID=45)
- **4th**
[Read Omens](/Spells.aspx?ID=247)

**[Change Shape](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=8)** <actions string="Single Action" /> ([Concentrate](/Traits.aspx?ID=32), [Occult](/Traits.aspx?ID=120), [Polymorph](/Traits.aspx?ID=127), [Transmutation](/Traits.aspx?ID=157)) The raktavarna takes on the appearance of a Tiny inanimate object. If, while transformed, the raktavarna takes any action other than the purely mental (such as [Recall Knowledge](/Actions.aspx?ID=26)), they immediately revert to their original form. Until then, they can use [Deception](/Skills.aspx?ID=5) to [Impersonate](/Actions.aspx?ID=46) the object.

**Designate Master**   A raktavarna can designate a creature as their master using a 10-minute invocation in which the master must participate. The raktavarna can revoke this status at any time.

**Master's Eyes**   As a 3-action activity with the [concentrate](/Traits.aspx?ID=32) trait, a raktavarna's master can observe the world through the raktavarna's eyes, instead of their own. This uses the raktavarna's Perception and [darkvision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=12). Each round, the master must spend a single action, which also has the concentrate trait, to maintain the connection. This ability functions at any range, even on different planes of existence. If the raktavarna dies while their master is using this ability, the master is [stunned 5](/Conditions.aspx?ID=36).

**Raktavarna Venom**  ([Poison](/Traits.aspx?ID=126)) **Saving Throw** DC 16 Fortitude; **Maximum Duration** 6 rounds; **Stage 1** 1d4 poison damage and [stupefied 1](/Conditions.aspx?ID=37) (1 round); **Stage 2** 1d4 poison damage and stupefied 2 (1 round)

</column>

name: Raktavarna
